protein.general_function: Involved in small GTPase regulator activity
protein.specific_function: May play a role as an effector of the ADP-ribosylation factor-like protein 2, ARL2

reference.reference_text: Sharer JD, Kahn RA: The ARF-like 2 (ARL2)-binding protein, BART. Purification, cloning, and initial characterization. J Biol Chem. 1999 Sep 24;274(39):27553-61.
